transcript:
Hello?
Customer: Haan ji sir bataiye.
Executive: Yes sir, very good afternoon, good evening sir, Priyanka baat kar rahi hu IndiaMART se. Sir aapne phone nahi uthaya, aapne 3 baje ka time diya uske baad aap call nahi answer kar rahe the. Mera aapko yahi kehna tha.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Sir aapka jo vyapar ka subscription ka aapko issue aa raha tha na ki aapka subscription jo hai wo live nahi hua. Yahi keh rahe the na aap sir?
Customer: Ji ji.
Executive: To sir aapko IndiaMART ke end se ek whatsapp aaya hoga agar aapne check kiya ho. Check kariye 28 October ko message aaya tha aapko vyapar subscription se related. 27 aapki service live hui thi, 28 ko ye message aa gaya tha. To us whatsapp 26 nahi mam 26 ko aaya hai aur 31 ko aaya hai.
Customer: Kya message aaya hai?
Executive: Isme aaya request call back, call now, visit website.
Executive: Request call back, call now, visit website. Uske alawa koi aur message?
Customer: Koi aur message nahi aaya to mai khud kar liya hota mam.
Executive: Uske alawa koi message nahi aaya. IndiaMART karke hi whatsapp pe message aa raha hoga agar aap check kar pa rahe ho. IndiaMART karke 28 October ko aapko ek message aaya hai subscription ka agar aapne check kiya ho. Plan subscription.
Customer: Get free license de raha hai mam.
Executive: Aapko meri voice aa rahi hai kya?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: 28 October ko aapko ek message aaya hai, hi Anil, six month free accounting software worth rupees 2000 free cost wala accounting software ka message aa raha hai. Dekh dekh raha hu mam dekh raha hu.
Executive: Dekhiye IndiaMART ke end se hi sir gaya hai wo aapko.
Customer: Ek minute dekh raha hu.
Executive: Haan please ek baar check kariye.
Customer: Nahi mam IndiaMART taraf se koi message nahi aaya.
Customer: Nahi aaya mam. Aap dobara bhejiye usko.
Customer: Nahi aaya ek baar dobara bhejiye.
Executive: Ek minute rukiye mai aapko bata deti hu. Ek minute rukiye.
Executive: Ek blue colour ke banner type me 28 October ka message pada hoga agar aapko nahi dikh raha message. Aap ek baar IndiaMART login kar lo. IndiaMART login karne ke baad buyer tool ka ek option aayega, thik hai? Jab aap buyer tool ke option pe jaoge to waha par aapko subscription ka dikha raha hoga vyapar ka aur accounting software ka. To aap waha se kar lijiye sir subscribe ko.
Customer: Thik hai mam dekhta hu nahi hoga to kal connect karta hu.
Executive: Haan please sir connect kariye kyuki agar aisa hai to hum fir aapke us issue ko resolve karayenge.
Customer: Thik hai mam mai dekh raha hu IndiaMART download kar raha hu kyuki desktop pe chala thik hai thik hai.
Executive: Kyuki koi aisa koi aisa problem nahi hai sir. Saari cheeze aapko milengi jo boli gayi hai sir.
Customer: Ji bilkul.
Executive: Thik hai mam thik hai mam mai dekh raha hu aapka thik.
Executive: Ji sir. Thik hai sir, thank you sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer's Vyapar subscription is not live.

- Customer did not receive WhatsApp message.



Resolution:

- Executive asked to check for the message.

- Executive asked to login to IndiaMART.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will connect if issue is unresolved.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- subscription, whatsapp, vyapar, accounting software
